About me

Hello! My name is Nikita and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. I have a serious passion for creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.

I am well-organised person, problem solver with high attention to detail, ready to learn something new at any time. I am Interested in the entire frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

Here are a few technologies I have been working with:

  • HTML
  • CSS
  • JavaScript (ES6+)
  • React
  • Redux
  • Express.js

My projects

  • Dental clinic

    A web application for patient management in dental clinic. Patient cards and appointments management, multiple profiles for different doctors, editable database of diagnosis and healings methods.

    • React
    • React-Redux
    • Redux-Thunk
    • Express.js
    • MongoDB
    • Axios

  • Chat with a replies from Chuck Norris API

    Messanger with jokes about Chuck Norris. There are registration and login, searching through the chats, getting replies from API after some seconds delay.

    • React
    • React-Redux
    • Axios
    • FireBase
    • Chuck Norris API

  • Space tourism multi-page website

    Fully responsive multi-page website for everyone who interested in space travel. Explore about space objects distance from the Earth, information about the crew for future expeditions to Mars and about nowadays space technologies.

    • HTML
    • CSS
    • SCSS
    • JavaScript
    • Swiper.js

Some more projects

  • Currency converter

    This web application, was made with a bank api, all functionality was copied from google currency converter.

    • React
    • React-Redux
    • Redux-Thunk
    • Axios

  • Pokemon directory

    Web application to find information about different Pokémons. Search by Pokémon name or filter by Pokémon type. Each Pokémon card shows pokémon illustrations, characteristics, and skills.

    • React
    • React-Redux
    • Pokemon API

  • Cocktails recipes book

    Web application for writing down a cocktails recipes. Create cocktails with a different methods like stir, build and shake.

    • React

    A webpage for creating, reading, updating, and deleting notes.

    Single page web store for selling electric POD systems. With animated smoke and PODs with a 3d effect.
